reference_summary:
{'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Sam Esmail', 'Jim McKay', 'Tricia Brock', 'Deborah Chow', 'Nisha Ganatra', 'Niels Arden Oplev', 'Christoph Schrewe'], 'Producers': ['Sam Esmail', 'Kyle Bradstreet', 'Steve Golin', 'Chad Hamilton'], 'Starring': ['Rami Malek', 'Christian Slater']} Pretty clever plot lines (though not always realistic) and very good acting. Far more interesting than you think a "hacker" drama would be. Definitely R-rated and pushes the limit of that at times. I'll keep watching on Amazon Prime. Better than expected for a hacker drama {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Rob Rapley'], 'Producers': ['Rob Rapley', 'Stephanie Haberman Bordas', 'Kathryn Lord'], 'Starring': ['Michael Murphy', 'Shuler Hensley', 'Kathryn Erbe'], 'Studio': ['PBS']} Lots of info about presidents Garfield and Arthur I never knew. Garfield could have been one of the best presidents ever. Looks like his doctor did more to kill him than the guy who shot him. Good acting in the docu-drama parts. Very engrossing. Well worth your time if you like learning little known history. {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Starring': ['Paul Giamatti', 'Laura Linney', 'Stephen Dilane'], 'Studio': ['HBO']} Johnny A finally gets his due! And Abigail too!
Fantastic acting. Great production quality for a period piece.
Adams, Jefferson, Washington, Hamilton, and Franklin are all here. Entertaining and educational! All the founding fathers excellently portrayed--but Abigail steals the show! {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Bill Condon'], 'Producers': ['Anne Carey', 'Iain Canning', 'Emile Sherman', 'Len Blavatnik', 'Aviv Giladi', 'Vince Holden', 'Christine Langan', 'Zanne Devine', 'Amy Nauiokas'], 'Starring': ['Ian McKellen', 'Laura Linney', 'Hiroyuki Sanada'], 'Studio': ['Paramount Pictures']} Great acting but devoid of any action or intrigue. This is a drama about a retired Sherlock slipping into senility. Mystery fans will be disappointed. Boring but well-acted drama. Not a Sherlock mystery movie. Heist Suspense, Action, Cerebral, Intense ["A casino card dealer, desperate to pay for his daughter's life-saving surgery, teams up with a co-worker to pull off a casino heist, but as the plan falters they find themselves hijacking a bus and using the hostages as collateral."] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Scott Mann'], 'Producers': ['Randall Emmett', 'George Furla', 'Wayne Marc Godfrey', 'Robert Jones', 'Stephen Sepher', 'Alexander Tabrizi'], 'Starring': ['Dave Bautista', 'Jeffrey Dean Morgan', 'Robert De Niro']} Major plot flaws in an otherwise clever heist film. Despite that, it was worth watching (for free with Prime membership). This is not a DeNiro caliber film--but somewhat enjoyable. {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'frightening scenes', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Sam Raimi'], 'Producers': ['Tom Rosenberg', 'James Jacks', 'Gary Lucchesi', 'Robert G. Tapert', 'Rob Tapert'], 'Starring': ['Keanu Reeves', 'Cate Blanchett', 'Hilary Swank']} Superstar line-up delivers good acting in this redneck-ESP thriller. Keanu makes a good bad guy. Good ESP-crime-mystery drama {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English', 'English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Susanne Bier'], 'Producers': ['Susanne Bier', 'Khadija Alami', 'Alexei Boltho', 'Rob Bullock', 'Simon Cornwell', 'Stephen Cornwell', 'Sam Englebardt', 'José Luis Escolar', 'David Farr', 'Brian Flanagan'], 'Starring': ['Hugh Laurie', 'Tom Hiddleston', 'Nader Boussandel']} Hugh Laurie is great. A good 6-episode drama. {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jason Reitman'], 'Producers': ['David O. Sacks'], 'Starring': ['Aaron Eckhart', 'Robert Duvall', 'Katie Holmes'], 'Studio': ['20TH CENTURY FOX']} Entertaining, funny, and great sociopolitical commentary. Great, great movie for adults and teens Booksmart Comedy, Confused, Joyous, Coarse ['In this refreshingly unfiltered comedy, two overachieving best friends decide to cram four years of fun into one daring, chaotic adventure on the eve of their high school graduation.'] {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Olivia Wilde'], 'Producers': ['Megan Ellison'], 'Starring': ['Kaitlyn Dever : Amy', 'Beanie Feldstein : Molly', 'Jessica R. Williams : Ms. Fine']} Funny, funny, funny!!!
Not for prudes! Funny funny girls!!! {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Michael Walker'], 'Producers': ['Alfred Sapse', 'John Wollman'], 'Starring': ['Joshua Caras', 'Olivia Luccardi', 'Paul Cooper'], 'Studio': ['Gravitas Ventures']} Great film about artists and the art world. Great writing. Thoroughly entertaining. Funny. So much better than most big studio movies. Fun movie about about artists and the art world. Great Indy film.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user maintains a strong affinity for mature-rated content, particularly narratives that merge technology, hacking, and thrillers, alongside historical docu-dramas. They appreciate films that provide both entertainment and sociopolitical commentary and have embraced comedies that balance humor with insight.

- **Genre Affinity:** The user has developed a critical stance towards suspense-action films, emphasizing the importance of compelling storytelling. They recently enjoyed an independent film centered on the art world, which highlighted their appreciation for narratives that are both entertaining and thematically rich.

- **Quality of Production:** With high expectations for acting and production quality, the user seeks strong performances and captivating narratives. Their experiences reflect a preference for well-crafted films that provide depth and satisfaction, often favoring independent projects over big studio productions.

- **Platform Engagement:** An enthusiastic consumer of streaming services like Amazon Prime, the user explores a wide spectrum of content, particularly those challenging societal norms, including outlandish comedies.

- **Content Advisory Awareness:** Comfortable with adult themes such as violence and substance use, the user actively seeks narratives that push boundaries and engage with complex issues.

- **Rating Behavior:** Maintaining an average rating of around 4.5, the user has recently adopted a more discerning approach, reflecting in lower ratings for unsatisfactory plots while showcasing a newfound appreciation for comedies that are both funny and thoughtful.

Overall, the user's profile highlights their pursuit of high-quality dramas and comedies that offer emotional and social depth, emphasizing a balance between serious themes and humor.
